lead_paragraph: The editor of Daily Variety has been pushed out after less than a year on the job.
snippet: Leo Wolinsky, a former Los Angeles Times editor, was brought in to revive Variety. Instead, he was let go after less than a year.

headline.main: Editor of Daily Variety Is Pushed Out

abstract: Leo Wolinsky, a former Los Angeles Times editor, was brought in to revive Variety. Instead, he was let go after less than a year.
